data.text: Ne medi be mada gbe le Israel ŋu la,
Dua me tɔwo hã mede dzesii be nye ŋku
“Wotsɔa woƒe nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔwɔ doa nukokoe na fia la,
Le miaƒe fia ƒe ŋkekenyui dzi la,
Woƒe dziwo bina abe kpodzo ene,
Wo katã woxɔ dzo abe kpodzo ene,
Du bubu me tɔwo xɔ ŋusẽ le esi, gake menya o.
Israel ƒe dada le ɖase dim le eŋuti;
“Efraim le abe ahɔnɛ movitɔ aɖe ene,
Gake ne woyi la, matsɔ nye ɖɔ atsyɔ wo;
Womedo ɣli nam tso woƒe dzi me o,
Nyee he wo, eye mena wokpɔ ŋusẽ,
Wometrɔ ɖe Dziƒoʋĩtɔ la ŋu o.
